snippet.title: Smash Point. Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into a cartoon-styled world, chasing and smashing each other with the coolest new weapons. Smash Point is a competitive multiplayer VR game full of visual fun.

The game is played in all against all mode, so the fun never ends because no one dies for long.

The game can host up to 10 players. Bots can be used to fill positions, and will automatically keep the number of players to a minimum of 6.

Find on VRP Platform: https://vrp.arvilab.com/
More games by ARVI VR here: https://vr.arvilab.com/products
